description: The standard a2 script module collection.
name: a2.modules
news:
* new OCR Tool to get text from unselectable things on screen
* CalculAid: new option to recycle already open 
  also repaired all the other options #2
* DetailsPopup: renamed fixed variable cleanup, fixed #36
* ExplorerCreateFile: Added Dialog to ask for Clipboard image file name, #35
* ExplorerHotketys: Togglers now more reliable
* ComfortResize: now makes use of cursor lib
* getWinfo: displaying "display cmd line string" if too long #37
* CommandLine: new Hotket to open from Explorer
* Ouch. WinR was broken for web addresses

Moved some rather experimental modules to a2.ModLab (SessionRestore, )
